home.feature1Desc: From Gladiator Tacos to Samurai Sushi, choose your edible avatar.
home.feature2Desc: Use secret spices and salty traps to sabotage your rivals' flavors.
home.feature3Desc: Outlast the competition to become the Supreme Snack.
home.footerCopy: © 2024 The Last of Snack. All rights reserved. Do not swallow the game pieces.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.subtitle: Master the art of culinary combat. Outlast, outclever, and outlive your snack rivals.
howToPlay.section1Copy: In this fast-paced tabletop battle, you are a snack with feelings—and a grudge. Your objective is simple: eliminate everyone else before they devour you.
howToPlay.actionAttackDesc: Target a player to remove one of their 'Freshness' tokens. Crunch!
howToPlay.actionDefendDesc: Play out of turn to block an incoming bite. Stay crispy for another round.
howToPlay.actionStealDesc: Swipe a random card from another snack's hand. Sharing is NOT caring.
howToPlay.actionPeekDesc: Look at the top 3 cards of the deck. Knowledge is delicious.
howToPlay.secretCopy: Every character has a unique Weakness Card. If an opponent plays your specific weakness card against you, you lose double freshness.
howToPlay.footerCopy: © 2024 The Last of Snack. All calories included.

lobby.title: Kitchen Lobby
lobby.suspicionMeterDescBody: After each turn, players vote: "Who looks overcooked?" Top voted player gains 1 Suspicion token. 3 tokens = automatic public reveal of category.
lobby.waitingForPlayers1: We still need {count} snacks more to fight for their lives.
lobby.waitingForPlayers2: {count} more hungry snacks and we're good to go!
lobby.waitingForPlayers4: Waiting for {count} more snacks to join the battle…
lobby.waitingForPlayers5: Gather {count} more snacks and the feast can begin!
lobby.waitingForHost1: The chef needs to hurry up or the dish will be burned!
lobby.waitingForHost2: Host, start the game before we get cold!
lobby.waitingForHost4: All snacks present—waiting for the host to fire up the oven!
lobby.waitingForHost5: We're all in. The host holds the start button!

connectionLost.crisisCopy: The milk has spilled! We lost your signal in the kitchen chaos. Don't let your snacks get cold!
connectionLost.notFoundCopy: That room code has expired or never existed. Check your spelling, chef! A single typo can ruin the whole recipe.
connectionLost.codeHint: Common codes look like: BREAD-42, CHIP-X9, SODA-01
connectionLost.footerCopy: © 2024 The Last of Snack. All crumbs reserved.

gameEnd.playAgainTitleHostOnly: Only the host can start again

assigning.subtitle: THE HEAT IS RISING IN THE KITCHEN
assigning.flavorText: Defend your crumbs at all costs.

eliminationModal.title: ELIMINATED!
eliminationModal.copyBody: The heat was too much for this snack. The kitchen has claimed another victim. You're out—but you can still watch and chat!

gameTable.endTurnTitle: Play a card to take your turn, or wait for the timer

settingsHelp.title: Settings and Help
settingsHelp.rule1: Join or create a room. Share the 8-character code so friends can join.
settingsHelp.rule2: Everyone gets a secret snack identity. Don't reveal it—others will try to eliminate you.
settingsHelp.rule3: On your turn, play a card from your hand. Cards can target others or protect you.
settingsHelp.rule4: If your weakness is triggered, you're eliminated. Last snack standing wins.
settingsHelp.rule5: Use the kitchen chat to bluff, accuse, or stay quiet. Defend your crumbs!
settingsHelp.viewFullGuide: View full How to Play guide
settingsHelp.leaveConfirm: Leave game? You'll need the room code to rejoin.
